example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS قال) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_NOM مصدر)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الوزير)) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN حقيبة))) (PP (PREP عن) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الحزب) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الوطني) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الديني)))) (NP (NOUN_PROP اسحق) (NOUN_PROP ليفي))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اتهم) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN_PROP شارون)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب_) (NP (PUNC ") (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الرضوخ)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ضغوط) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اليسار)) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (DET+ADJ.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN المعارض) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN لقانون))))))))) (PUNC ")))))))

role.argrole: to whom / what? (usually marked by ل)
